description:
Looking for USB 3.0 cables?

Why pay more for less? USB 3.0 cables offer the fastest and most reliable connections available to your PC, ensuring a smooth transfer of data - up to 6 times faster than with older, slower speeds!

The new USB standard is coming to town! USB 3.0 for fast data transfer and more from your computer or laptop, so you can download photos and videos in seconds flat with no hassle of a slow internet connection. The best part? You will have the convenience that comes with using Micro-USB cables while still being able to enjoy faster speeds at an affordable price without sacrificing performance as it uses less power than its predecessor - now easier on battery life too!

The latest-gen cables have been designed to increase data transfer speeds, and it is now faster than ever! The new connector design does not only offer more speed but also offers a smaller size that will enable you to connect multiple devices while still leaving room for other peripherals such as joysticks or keyboards on your desk.

With USB 3.0, the transmission speed is 10 times faster than before! And it's also backward compatible with all of your old devices and cables so you'll never have to worry about being stuck in a pickle when you don't want to be.
name: USB3.0 Cables
